2023 年 12 月 29 日星期五 00:22:57 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
为什么企业需要梦想家的魔力和实干家的现实主义？贝丝·维纳贝丝·维纳At work, the dreamers often get credit for the big ideas, but they can also sometimes seem untethered to reality to the doers, who are trying to ... get things done. It's when these two types of humans work in harmony that business magic happens, says culture strategist Beth Viner. She lays out a practical blueprint for harnessing the dreamer's out-of-the-box thinking and the doer's practicality, showing why it's the key to building, growing and innovating in any relationship or organization.为什么企业需要梦想家的魔力和实干家的现实主义？贝丝·维纳At work, the dreamers often get credit for the big ideas, but they can also sometimes seem untethered to reality to the doers, who are trying to ... get things done. It's when these two types of humans work in harmony that business magic happens, says culture strategist Beth Viner. She lays out a practical blueprint for harnessing the dreamer's out-of-the-box thinking and the doer's practicality, showing why it's the key to building, growing and innovating in any relationship or organization. https://www.ted.com/talks/beth_viner_why_businesses_need_a_dreamer_s_magic_and_a_doer_s_realism?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:122223 122223 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 15:44:32 +0000高等教育不00:11:06泰德
当人工智能可以伪造现实时，你还能信任谁？ |萨姆·格雷戈里萨姆·格雷戈里We're fast approaching a world where widespread, hyper-realistic deepfakes lead us to dismiss reality, says technologist and human rights advocate Sam Gregory. What happens to democracy when we can't trust what we see? Learn three key steps to protecting our ability to distinguish human from synthetic — and why fortifying our perception of truth is crucial to our AI-infused future.当人工智能可以伪造现实时，你还能信任谁？ |萨姆·格雷戈里We're fast approaching a world where widespread, hyper-realistic deepfakes lead us to dismiss reality, says technologist and human rights advocate Sam Gregory. What happens to democracy when we can't trust what we see? Learn three key steps to protecting our ability to distinguish human from synthetic — and why fortifying our perception of truth is crucial to our AI-infused future. https://www.ted.com/talks/sam_gregory_when_ai_can_fake_reality_who_can_you_trust?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:122245 122245 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 15:59:12 +0000高等教育不00:12:01泰德
我的使命是改变心理健康的叙述|格伦·克洛斯格伦·克洛斯Legendary actor and mental health advocate Glenn Close is on a quest to change how we think about mental health, starting with her decision to speak out about her own family's struggles — a brave choice considering the stigma that pervades the topic. In a sweeping conversation with TEDWomen curator Pat Mitchell, Close shares the inspiration behind the advocacy group she founded to combat the crisis, underscoring the transformative power of community and the critical need for comprehensive mental health care systems.我的使命是改变心理健康的叙述|格伦·克洛斯Legendary actor and mental health advocate Glenn Close is on a quest to change how we think about mental health, starting with her decision to speak out about her own family's struggles — a brave choice considering the stigma that pervades the topic. In a sweeping conversation with TEDWomen curator Pat Mitchell, Close shares the inspiration behind the advocacy group she founded to combat the crisis, underscoring the transformative power of community and the critical need for comprehensive mental health care systems. https://www.ted.com/talks/glenn_close_my_mission_to_change_the_narrative_of_mental_health?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:122057 122057 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 15:45:48 +0000高等教育不00:12:08泰德
为什么你应该拥抱平庸 |克里斯平·瑟洛克里斯平·瑟洛From "elite" pickles to "premium" baby diapers, marketers are constantly telling us to seek superiority — but "by the simple law of averages, most of us have to live a life more ordinary," says sociolinguist Crispin Thurlow. He invites us to embrace mediocrity for a change, offering a different path to contentedness without comparison.为什么你应该拥抱平庸 |克里斯平·瑟洛From "elite" pickles to "premium" baby diapers, marketers are constantly telling us to seek superiority — but "by the simple law of averages, most of us have to live a life more ordinary," says sociolinguist Crispin Thurlow. He invites us to embrace mediocrity for a change, offering a different path to contentedness without comparison. https://www.ted.com/talks/crispin_thurlow_why_you_should_embrace_mediocrity?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:121937 121937 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 15:57:14 +0000高等教育不00:10:37泰德
为什么人工智能将引发指数级经济增长 |凯西·伍德凯西·伍德Investor Cathie Wood explores this unique moment in technology, which she sees as being marked by the simultaneous evolution of five pivotal innovation platforms — a scenario unparalleled in history. Exploring the role of AI in reshaping economic paradigms, she predicts a surge in global GDP growth and productivity, underscoring the need for businesses and investors to adapt in order to keep up.为什么人工智能将引发指数级经济增长 |凯西·伍德Investor Cathie Wood explores this unique moment in technology, which she sees as being marked by the simultaneous evolution of five pivotal innovation platforms — a scenario unparalleled in history. Exploring the role of AI in reshaping economic paradigms, she predicts a surge in global GDP growth and productivity, underscoring the need for businesses and investors to adapt in order to keep up. https://www.ted.com/talks/cathie_wood_why_ai_will_spark_exponential_economic_growth?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:121069 121069 Fri, 15 Dec 2023 19:49:23 +0000高等教育不00:14:37泰德

如何建立全球民主运动|约丹诺斯·埃约尔约丹诺斯·埃约尔"Democracy is the most compelling vision we have for self-governance," says freedom advocate Yordanos Eyoel. Taking a stand against predatory and opportunist authoritarian forces, she shares how to reimagine, accelerate and protect the pro-democracy movement — to build societies that are both functional and inclusive.如何建立全球民主运动|约丹诺斯·埃约尔"Democracy is the most compelling vision we have for self-governance," says freedom advocate Yordanos Eyoel. 我们死后会发生什么？ |凯瑟琳·曼尼克斯凯瑟琳·曼尼克斯Have we lost the practical wisdom of what happens as people die? With lessons from a career witnessing thousands of people's final breaths, palliative care expert Kathryn Mannix urges us to demystify the experience of death, sharing how a better understanding of what actually happens can reduce fear in the final days, for you and your loved ones.我们死后会发生什么？ |凯瑟琳·曼尼克斯Have we lost the practical wisdom of what happens as people die? With lessons from a career witnessing thousands of people's final breaths, palliative care expert Kathryn Mannix urges us to demystify the experience of death, sharing how a better understanding of what actually happens can reduce fear in the final days, for you and your loved ones. https://www.ted.com/talks/kathryn_mannix_what_happens_as_we_die_dec_2023?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:122060 122060 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 15:59:14 +0000高等教育不00:14:29泰德
善举如何引发全球运动|阿莎·柯兰阿莎·柯兰"We underestimate the power of our own generous actions," says Asha Curran, CEO of the global generosity movement GivingTuesday. Sharing stories of people making a difference through simple acts of kindness, she shows how generosity, even in its simplest forms, can be a transformative force — and explains why we all benefit from a world grounded in giving.善举如何引发全球运动|阿莎·柯兰"We underestimate the power of our own generous actions," says Asha Curran, CEO of the global generosity movement GivingTuesday. 应对气候变化的时间已经不多了。虚拟宇宙可以提供帮助|塞德里克·奈克塞德里克·奈克The metaverse could be our key to making real progress in the fight against climate change, says engineer Cedrik Neike. Examining how AI-powered modeling eliminates the trial and error of wasteful industries, he explores how this emerging technology is already improving everything from the gigafactories that churn out electric car batteries to the fuel efficiency of your home. Learn more about how these "digital twins" are transforming the world — and not a moment too soon.应对气候变化的时间已经不多了。虚拟宇宙可以提供帮助|塞德里克·奈克The metaverse could be our key to making real progress in the fight against climate change, says engineer Cedrik Neike. Examining how AI-powered modeling eliminates the trial and error of wasteful industries, he explores how this emerging technology is already improving everything from the gigafactories that churn out electric car batteries to the fuel efficiency of your home. Learn more about how these "digital twins" are transforming the world — and not a moment too soon. https://www.ted.com/talks/cedrik_neike_time_is_running_out_on_climate_change_the_metaverse_could_help?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:121580 121580 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 15:57:46 +0000高等教育不00:09:52泰德
贝多芬第九交响曲的人生教训|本杰明·赞德本杰明·赞德Legendary conductor Benjamin Zander explains his view on the difference between "positive thinking" and "possibility" (one's a fraud; the other's the real thing, he says) and intersperses delightful stories from a lifetime in music with a sing-along to Beethoven's Symphony No. 9.贝多芬第九交响曲的人生教训|本杰明·赞德Legendary conductor Benjamin Zander explains his view on the difference between "positive thinking" and "possibility" (one's a fraud; the other's the real thing, he says) and intersperses delightful stories from a lifetime in music with a sing-along to Beethoven's Symphony No. 9. https://www.ted.com/talks/benjamin_zander_life_lessons_from_beethoven_s_symphony_no_9?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119256 119256 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 15:45:25 +0000高等教育不00:19:09泰德
